name: Atom Fishing II
description: Atom Fishing 2 is a fishing simulator taken place during post-apocalyptic era.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GF GTX 460 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GF GT 7xx DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews.review_text: good game. 10/10 would recommend to people that like a lannguage barrier... 9/10 to those who dont

Installed it, selected english, no idea what's going on because just about everything is in Russian. I don't mind Russia or Russians, I love Russia, my wife is Russian, but I can't speak it, neither can 99% of steam users, so releasing this game in Russian only seems kinda stupid.
